content: Kim Wuk-sang Park has a retired naval ship, and there is an exhibition hall that introduces the history of the Navy and major naval battles. There is also a small experience street and you can see the surrounding scenery from the deck. Admission is also very cheap 😊

It is located at the entrance of Daemyung Port, which crosses Ganghwa Road from Gimpo. From the perspective of it, it seems that there is just a warship floating, but it was remodeled and made into a new park. While looking inside the actual ship, we were able to observe the warships we didn't know curiously. Although it is operated for a fee, it is not a burdensome price, and the sunset seen in the evening is spectacular.
A different place where an aircraft carrier located in Daemyung Port was converted into a park If you climb on a boat, you can see the super earthquake and Ganghwa Island over the sea.
